grails.plugin.multitenant.core
Interface MultiTenantDomainClass

public interface MultiTenantDomainClass

All multi tenant domain classes should implement this interface. If a @MultiTenant annotated domain class doesn't implement this interface it will be added by an AST transformation. There is no need to add the methods defined by this interface manually as a tenantId property is added to all @MultiTenant annotated domain classes. Groovy will create the get and set method for us.

Author:
Kim A. Betti
